extendedInfo.description: Relax as you enjoy interacting with incredibly smooth and responsive pools of liquid. Use fingers to smear paint, jiggle gelatin, or fling brightly-colored balls through puddles of mud. Preset configurations are available to show what's possible: Ink in Water, Finger-Painting, Milky Way, Thick Paint, Gelatin, Oil Paint, Wet Mud, and Bowl of Paint. Customize properties to create your own unique fluid environment. Change the colors, add sparkles or bouncing balls to your liquid.

reviews.title: Water sounds, please!
reviews.comment: After sorting through all the live wallpapers, I\'ve finally found what I was looking for, except for one thing - water sounds! Please add sounds, & I\'ll bump my rating up to 5 stars.
reviews.author: Sarah Petersen

reviews.title: Please, please, please....
reviews.comment: This would be a #1 app if you could PLEASE make it a screensaver! This is so AWESOME and fun! This is one of my favorite apps of all times, but a screensaver with sound would push it to the top of the list for a lot of people! Thank you so much : )
reviews.author: Mama Bear

reviews.title: Omg
reviews.comment: This is so beautiful exactly what i am looking for on my weekends great job make more many more. :-)
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Good job! Add walls
reviews.comment: It is nice that it uses 5MB ram! I wish the user would be able to draw free hand or pointwise no-slip walls.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Mesmerizing
reviews.comment: Its great for relaxing, kinda mesmerizing. In your add u have beautiful music, please please add this to app.  Relaxing music would make it 5* (lovely to have no glitches or adds!)
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Much better than the description suggests
reviews.comment: I\'ve never seen something like this -- the liquid effect is not only touch sensitive -- when you tilt your device, the liquid runs to one side and splashes, etc.  It\'s worth a download -- very clever and nicely designed
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great, but....
reviews.comment: Excellent app, was overjoyed to see it on Google Play - but unfortunately, the sparkles don\'t work on my device for some reason... (Samsung Tab2 7). If anyone has any ideas on correcting this, I\'d love to hear from them!

reviews.title: Fun
